summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 724 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 775.4m higher than yesterday, 131.8m lower than the past week, 724.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 2040m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2170m and 2770m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will feel quite humid. Drizzle or light rain possible, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Weather could become unsettled.
